zh: 信驊科技創新產品─AST1500榮獲台北國際電腦展「Best Choice of COMPUTEX TAIPEI 2009 Aw
位於新竹科學園區的信驊科技，這家高度創新的fabless Soc –centric IC設計公司很高興地於2009年6月2號宣布ASPEED AST1500贏得台北國際電腦展的「Best Choice of COMPUTEX TAIPEI 2009 Award」獎項，此獎由業界、學術界、媒體界及政府部門的專家們一致認同並且頒發。
信驊科技AST1500為高創新設計的產品，它使用電腦數據集中化來降低IT伺服成本，並通過相同的IT基礎設備來加強數據安全性，同時也降低了雜訊以及能源消耗。
信驊科技董事長林鴻明先生表示：“信驊科技很榮幸獲得台北國際電腦展最高榮譽「Best Choice Award」獎項。我們很驕傲提供業界此項高品質、高性能且超低能源消耗的解決方案，AST1500非常符合現今市場的期望。”
關於 ASPEED信驊科技股份有限公司“信驊科技”成立於2004年11月，為一家高度創新的fabless半導體公司。致力於提供先進的SOC中央運算產品，包含矽晶片、IP以及相關軟體產品，此產品之應用目標為多媒體、影像與網路功能。欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站 http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
媒體聯絡方式：吳俐俐行銷暨業務部資深行銷專員連絡電話：886-955-988-421Lili_wu@aspeedtech.com
en: ASPEED Technology Wins Best Choice 2009 Award of Computex Taipei

Computex , Taipei, June 2, 2009 - ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless SoC-centric IC design house is pleased to announce the ASPEED AST1500 has won the “Best Choice 2009 Award” of Computex Taipei, an award recognized and given by an evaluation committee comprised of experts from the industry, academia, media and government.

The ASPEED AST1500 was designed from the ground up to be highly innovative in reduce IT service cost by centralizing PCs in a data center.  It improves data security through the same IT infrastructure and reduce noise and power consumption.

"ASPEED is honored to win the prestigious Best Choice of COMPUTEX TAIPEI 2009 Award," commented Chris Lin, President of ASPEED Technology Inc. "We are proud to offer the industry’s highest quality, highest performance, and most low power consumption solution available on the market today, and the AST1500 certainly matches the expectation."  About ASPEED Technology Inc.ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless company founded in Nov. 2004, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, devotes itself to providing silicon chips, silicon IPs and software products that enable sophisticated SOC-centric multimedia, graphics and network applications. For more detailed information, please visit ASPEED website at http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
